about_the_game:
This game is a mix of two genres - Tover Defense and Survival. You have to get into the times of feudal fragmentation and put an end to this era.

The main point of is to capture new territories, build and expand your base to repel the raids of feudal lords and other inhabitants of this era

Game Features

  • Raise cattle and farm
  • Get resources and use crafting to create the right items
  • Explore the huge map and capture new territories to expand your principality
  • Fight various bosses to prevent the destruction of your possessions
  • Find secret corners and objects hidden all over the map
  • Face the natural difficulties of each of the biomes
  • Enjoy a very simple and at the same time addictive gameplay

name: Feudal Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-10400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 10

supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
*languages with full audio support
